SEARCH
Package View

Class MainMenuView

java.lang.Object
View.MainMenuView
public class MainMenuView extends Object
View class that displays the main menu and handles user input in the application. It interacts with the MainMenuController to perform the necessary operations.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Adrian Reszka

  • Method Details

    • displayMainMenu

      public void displayMainMenu()
      Displays the main menu GUI with buttons and a tree structure for students. This method initializes the main frame of the application.

    • createButtonPanel

      private JPanel createButtonPanel()
      Creates a JPanel containing buttons for various student-related actions.
      Returns:
      A JPanel with buttons to add, edit, or remove students and grades.

    • createStudentTreeNodes

      private DefaultMutableTreeNode createStudentTreeNodes()
      Generates the root node of the student tree, with each student and their grades represented as child nodes.
      Returns:
      The root node of the JTree representing the students and their grades.

    • updateTreeModel

      private void updateTreeModel()
      Updates the model of the student tree by reloading the tree structure with updated data.

    • createAddStudentPanel

      public JPanel createAddStudentPanel(JTextField idField, JTextField nameField, JTextField surnameField)
      Creates a JPanel used for adding a new student, which includes fields for student`s ID, name, and surname.
      Parameters:
      idField - JTextField for entering the student ID.
      nameField - JTextField for entering the student's name.
      surnameField - JTextField for entering the student's surname.
      Returns:
      A JPanel containing the input fields for adding a new student.

    • createAddGradeToStudentPanel

      public JPanel createAddGradeToStudentPanel(JTextField idField, JTextField gradeField, JTextField teacherField, JTextField subjectField)
      Creates a JPanel used for adding a grade to student, which includes fields for student`s ID, grade value, teacher and subject names.
      Parameters:
      idField - JTextField for entering the student ID.
      gradeField - JTextField for entering the grade value.
      teacherField - JTextField for entering the teacher`s name.
      subjectField - JTextField for entering the name of a subject.
      Returns:
      A JPanel containing the input fields for adding a new student.

    • createRemoveStudentPanel

      public JPanel createRemoveStudentPanel(JTextField idField)
      Creates a JPanel used for removing a student, which include field for student`s ID.
      Parameters:
      idField - JTextField for entering the student`s ID.
      Returns:
      A JPanel containing the input fields for adding a new student.

    • createRemoveGradePanel

      public JPanel createRemoveGradePanel(JTextField idField, JTextField gradeIndexField)
      Creates a JPanel used for removing a grade from student, which includes fields for student`s ID and grade index.
      Parameters:
      idField - JTextField for entering the student ID.
      gradeIndexField - JTextField for entering the student grade index.
      Returns:
      A JPanel containing the input fields for adding a new student.

    • createEditStudentPanel

      public JPanel createEditStudentPanel(JTextField idField, JTextField newNameField, JTextField newSurnameField)
      Creates a JPanel used for editing student data, which includes fields for student ID, new name and surname.
      Parameters:
      idField - JTextField for entering the student ID.
      newNameField - JTextField for entering the new student's name.
      newSurnameField - JTextField for entering the new student's surname.
      Returns:
      A JPanel containing the input fields for adding a new student.

    • createEditStudentGradePanel

      public JPanel createEditStudentGradePanel(JTextField idField, JTextField gradeIndexField, JTextField newGradeField, JTextField newTeacherField, JTextField newSubjectField)
      Creates a JPanel used for editing student`s grade, which includes fields for student ID, grade index, new grade value, teacher and subject name.
      Parameters:
      idField - JTextField for entering the student ID.
      gradeIndexField - JTextField for entering the student's name.
      newGradeField - JTextField for entering the student's surname.
      newTeacherField - JTextField for entering the new teacher`s name.
      newSubjectField - JTextField for entering the new subject`s name
      Returns:
      A JPanel containing the input fields for adding a new student.
